meanings.definition: The wood of the cherry tree, used for furniture and other decorative items.
meanings.sent1: The table was crafted from cherrywood.
meanings.sent2: The cabinet gleamed with the rich tones of cherrywood.
meanings.sent3: The chair made of cherrywood seemed to whisper secrets.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as smooth and warm as cherrywood.
meanings.sent5: The scent of cherrywood filled the room, bringing a sense of nature indoors.

meanings.definition: A reddish-brown color resembling that of cherrywood.
meanings.sent1: The artist mixed paints to create the perfect shade of cherrywood.
meanings.sent2: The sunset painted the sky in hues of cherrywood.
meanings.sent3: His cheeks turned cherrywood red when he realized his mistake.
meanings.sent4: The old barn stood weathered, its walls the color of cherrywood.
meanings.sent5: The autumn leaves rustled in the wind, displaying shades of cherrywood and gold.
